news_header: Fortum's net sales decreased to EUR 1.1 billion, with a lower operating profit of EUR 158 million due to reduced electricity prices.
news_text: Fortum reported net sales of EUR 1.1 billion for the July-September period, down from EUR 1.2 billion a year ago. The company's comparable operating profit fell to EUR 158 million from EUR 226 million previously. CEO Markus Rauramo noted that high rainfall, good nuclear power availability, and increased production from wind and solar contributed to the decline in Nordic spot prices.
